issue.title: [CF 1298] Aura Duration Glitch
issue.body:
Right now I have multiple chained meta icons that are group controllers that I use to populate some buffs/debuffs I want to track, and when some of these expire naturally via running out of time, the icon lingers with no duration for either a few seconds, or in some cases indefinitely, with multiple copies of the same aura showing up in the group. This only occurs on the latest alpha version.


> Posted by CurseForge user srobins6 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1298 | Raw
